description:
Whirlipede, known as the Curlipede Pok√©mon, is the evolved form of Venipede. Protected by a hard shell, it`s usually motionless, but when it`s attacked, it rotates at high speed and crashes furiously into the opponent(s).
Burgh uses a Whirlipede against Ash in a gym battle.
name: Wheega
